installation.title: Installation
installation.description: How would you like to install Symply? It's so symply, it's right here.

Home.title: Build Your
Home.description: Symply offers you the ultimate simplicity to create unique servers. Unleash your creativity without constraints and build unforgettable gaming worlds in the blink of an eye.

modal.title: Download
modal.description:
You are about to download Symply, our beta application designed to simplify the creation of Minecraft Bedrock servers.

As a development team, we urge you to use Symply with caution and understand that errors may occur.

For more information about our beta version and to report issues, please refer to our documentation.

button-download.title: Download Symply
button-download.tooltip: You must confirm that you have read the above information to be able to download Symply.

card.title: Warning
card.description: If you encounter issues on your Minecraft servers, please note that we are in a testing phase and cannot guarantee the resolution of all problems. However, we are here to help, so feel free to join our Discord server if you need assistance.

check.no: I have carefully read everything necessary to stay informed
